name: mall-helper
title: Mall Helper
author: waltermundt
description:
This mod adds a tool to help you make or update malls. It automatically detects inserters placing items from assembly machines into chests, and adds circuit or logistic network conditions to limit how many items are stored. To use it, click the tiny button the in the top right of the 0.17 shortcut bar and enable the shortcut.

ALPHA VERSION -- PM me on Reddit or Discord (waltermundt#3261) if you try it and run into issues.
